actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the provision of United States Government assistance to any Lebanese government that is influenced or controlled by Hezbollah.
short_title: Stop Sending American Taxpayer Money To Governments Controlled By Terrorists Act of 2020
subjects: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

summary.text:
Stop Sending American Taxpayer Money To Governments Controlled By Terrorists Act of 2020

This bill prohibits the U.S. government from providing assistance to any Lebanese government (1) of which Hezbollah is a member; (2) over which Hezbollah exercises undue influence; or (3) in which a ministry, agency, or instrumentality of that government is controlled by Hezbollah.

titles.title: Stop Sending American Taxpayer Money To Governments Controlled By Terrorists Act of 2020
Stop Sending American Taxpayer Money To Governments Controlled By Terrorists Act of 2020
A bill to prohibit the provision of United States Government assistance to any Lebanese government that is influenced or controlled by Hezbollah.
